CHAT.comment: mom moves Robodog to center of room.
child walks away from Robodog and sits in a chair at the table.
child gets back on the floor.
mom pushes button on Robodog's head.
Robodog is about to walk off the table.
INV removes Robodog from the room.
mom makes meerkat go after child.
child pushes meerkat away and laughs.
mom stands meerkat up on table and child knocks meerkat down.
child stands up and chair falls over.
child looks at himself in mirror.
mom plays with the meerkat with child and child pushes meerkat away.
child grabs meerkat from mom and throws meerkat on table.
mom tries to stand meerkat up on table and child tries to knock meerkat over.
child grabs meerkat from mom and squeezes his arms.
INV removes meerkat from the room
INV and child uncover starfish tank.
mom and child move over to the tank.
child reaches around starfish and touches the glass.
child tries to open top of tank.
child reaches behind tank to touch thermometer.
child walks to the other side of the tank.
mom points to algae in the tank.
child moves to the side of the tank to look at the starfish with his mom.
mom hands INV the starfish tank cover.
INV walks over to computer box.
INV and child uncover computer box.
child knocks on computer box and mom laughs.
mom motions hands in air like she is drumming.
INV enters the room with degu.
child tries to touch degu and pulls his hand away quickly.
mom and child talk to degu.
mom and child talk to degu.
mom points to something on degu cage cover.
child gets his finger stuck in the cage.
child puts car onto the floor.
mom drives the car on the table.
mom pretends to honk horn in car.
mom and child go onto floor.
child rolls car to mom and makes car flip over.
